greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of minimal subsets of {1...n} with least common multiple n.
comment: Note that the elements must be pairwise indivisible divisors of n.
Differs from A303838 at positions {1, 180, 210, ...}. For example, a(210) = 49, A303838(210) = 55. - _Gus Wiseman_, Apr 01 2019
link: Gus Wiseman, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 19 2019
